name: Jackass Human Slingshot
description:
This is the official Jackass mobile game! 🚀 Launch Johnny Knoxville high up in the air on a rocket-strapped shopping cart 🧨 🛒 using the Human Slingshot. Go fling yourself across various levels to unlock new vehicles and outfits, crashing into all the obstacles in your way, doing as much damage as possible to the level... and to Knoxville ☠️.

GET HURT, GET REWARDS 💥
Earn more by flying further, and breaking more obstacles/bones.

JACKASS OUTFITS 🕺
Unlock iconic outfits, including ones from Jackass Forever!

ABSURD VEHICLES 🛶
From a shopping cart, a kid's dump truck, to Grandpa Irving's scooter.

Play the game and watch the movie - 🎬 Jackass Forever, in theaters February 4!

. 

Developed by BBTV Interactive
